Array¶

class zserio.array.Array(arrayTraits, rawArray=None, *, isAuto=None, isImplicit=None, setOffsetMethod=None, checkOffsetMethod=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Abstraction for arrays to which Zserio arrays are mapped in python.

Constructor.

Parameters:
  • arrayTraits – Array traits which specify the array type.
  • rawArray – Native python list which will be hold by this abstraction.
  • isAuto – True if mapped Zserio array is auto array.
  • isImplicit – True if mapped Zserio array is implicit array.
  • setOffsetMethod – Set offset method if mapped Zserio array is indexed offset array.
  • checkOffsetMethod – Check offset method if mapped Zserio array is indexed offset array.

Methods Summary

bitSizeOf(bitPosition) Returns length of array stored in the bit stream in bits.
fromReader(arrayTraits, reader[, size, …]) Constructs array and reads elements from the given bit stream reader.
getRawArray() Gets raw array.
initializeOffsets(bitPosition) Initializes indexed offsets for the array.
read(reader[, size]) Reads array from the bit stream.
write(writer) Writes array to the bit stream.

Methods Documentation

bitSizeOf(bitPosition)[source]¶

Returns length of array stored in the bit stream in bits.

Parameters:bitPosition – Current bit stream position.
Returns:Length of the array stored in the bit stream in bits.
classmethod fromReader(arrayTraits, reader, size=None, *, isAuto=None, isImplicit=None, setOffsetMethod=None, checkOffsetMethod=None)[source]¶

Constructs array and reads elements from the given bit stream reader.

Parameters:
  • arrayTraits – Array traits which specify the array type.
  • reader – Bit stream from which to read.
  • size – Number of elements to read or None in case of implicit or auto arrays.
  • rawArray – Native python list which will be hold by this abstraction.
  • isAuto – True if mapped Zserio array is auto array.
  • isImplicit – True if mapped Zserio array is implicit array.
  • setOffsetMethod – Set offset method if mapped Zserio array is indexed offset array.
  • checkOffsetMethod – Check offset method if mapped Zserio array is indexed offset array.
Returns:

Array instance filled using given bit stream reader.
getRawArray()[source]¶

Gets raw array.

Returns:Native python list which is hold by the array.
initializeOffsets(bitPosition)[source]¶

Initializes indexed offsets for the array.

Parameters:bitPosition – Current bit stream position.
Returns:Updated bit stream position which points to the first bit after the array.
read(reader, size=None)[source]¶

Reads array from the bit stream.

Parameters:
  • reader – Bit stream from which to read.
  • size – Number of elements to read or None in case of implicit or auto arrays.
write(writer)[source]¶

Writes array to the bit stream.

Parameters:writer – Bit stream where to write.
